Description:
Outstanding Family Living in Coveted Position
SALE BY FIXED DATE Tuesday 28th March 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Enjoying a coveted position, popular for its privacy and family-friendly nature, this welcoming, split-level residence will delight with zoned accommodation and excellent presentation throughout.
Spacious and flexible living areas include a large downstairs rumpus room ideal for use as a teenagers retreat or children's playroom, and an open-plan living and dining room with a brand new, well-appointed kitchen displaying ceaserstone benchtops, a 900mm s/s oven and Bosch dishwasher. From here, indoor living merges with the outdoors via glass sliding doors to a covered deck complete with log fire and outdoor spa. The in-ground swimming pool and astro-turf lawn beyond ensure the perfect playground for every member of the family, not to mention create the perfect entertaining space.
Back inside and the upstairs accommodation includes 4 spacious bedrooms (BIRs), main with WIR and ensuite, together with a central, family-sized bathroom and separate WC. Additional features include: GDH, evaporative cooling, s/s air-conditioning, laundry with external access, downstairs powder room, storage room/study space, shed and double garage with internal access.
Enjoy close proximity to McAdam Square shops, bus services and quality schools including Yarra Road Primary, Croydon Hills Primary, Good Shepherd and Luther College, as well as Yarra Valley Grammar. There are also nearby nature reserves and walking trails for your recreation and enjoyment. Inspect today.
Insights: 21 Elana Court, Croydon North VIC 3136 was last sold in 2017 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Croydon North have recently been sold.

Address: 4/73 Bonnie View Road Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
Whisper Quiet Luxury - Only 1 Year Young
Privacy that feels like a house, quality finishes and 2 decks set this 1 year young, single-level townhouse above the rest. In a quiet rear position in an elite block of 6, it's a dream for downsizers, investors and professionals; just a few short steps from transport, Exeter village, kinder and reserves. You'll experience elegance, light and luxury from the high ceilings, timber floors, quality blinds, LED downlights and feature windows framing leafy outlooks, to the extensive storage, internal access remote garage, ducted heating, split system and security doors. Imagine a large, open plan CaesarStone and s/s appointed kitchen showcasing glass splashbacks, island and pantry (power and phone points). Relax in the spacious lounge/dining room or entertain guests on the deck and enjoy serenity in the generous, easy-care landscaped garden (space to grow vegies). Two double bedrooms (robes, ceiling fans), a powder room and upmarket 2-way bathroom (floor-to-ceiling tiles) are quietly zoned. A big master impresses with ensuite-effect bathroom access, WIR, dual blinds and deck. Plus: shed and water storage. Near Croydon Central, station and schools.
Angelique Rita : 0421 319 516

Description:
Stylish with park perspective
This stunning fully renovated transformation could be yours with its industrial chic inspirations and enviable designer flair. Bright and inviting, every room has been thoughtfully styled for today's living, encompassing 4 bedrooms/3 + study, all beautifully appointed bedrooms and 2 luxurious bathrooms with rain showerheads and unique honeycomb design tile features. Master robed with own ensuite. Freshly polished Tasmanian Oak floorboards lead through to a separate living/rumpus and an open configuration of family/dining enhanced by a stylish industrial toned kitchen with s/s appliances, Bosch dishwasher, soft close cabinetry and large pantry with BI lighting, offset by black subway-style tiled splashback and steel pendant ceiling lights. This wonderful space extends to a king-sized merbau entertaining deck with glorious views to a neighbouring reserve. Invite your friends for a BBQ and watch the kids play safely below on the enormous grass expanses of this 1074m2 block, with direct access to Griff Hunt Reserve. The front gardens have been professionally landscaped for minimal maintenance and maximum appeal and the home is light and neutral with nothing to do but explore this family focused neighbourhood. In future years, the size of this block offers plenty of scope for extensions/development STCA. Minutes to Oxley and Luther Colleges, Yarra Valley Grammar and a range of primary schools and child care services. Close to local shops and cafes, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, cinemas, public transport, bike tracks and freeway connections.
Comprehensively equipped with GDH, evaporative cooling, 4 x s/s remote ceiling fans, hardwood floors, LED lights, laundry, storage including underhouse, garden shed, roof repointed/sprayed and double remote garage plus boat/trailer parking.

EMMERSON COURT - All Sold Out
Emmerson Court is the latest development from quality local builder ‘Lewcon”. Conveniently located offering easy access to central Croydon, Croydon North, Chirnside park shopping centre, Eastland and Eastlink.
There are six large homes to choose from all boasting three bedrooms, ensuite and double garage. Luxury features include: remote garage door and internal access from the garage, designer landscaping, sleek gourmet kitchens with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, water tanks and much more.

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Perfect Start/Investment in Prime Location
Centrally set on a 511m2 (approx.) corner block, this charming home with classic neutral tones throughout, is accessed through a private gated entry off Humber Road and is surrounded by fully enclosed easy-care, landscaped gardens and lawn areas â?? perfect for young children/pets to safely enjoy.
Highlights include:
- Master bedroom with BIR and split-system a/c and another generous robed bedroom with modern ceiling fan/light, share a bright bathroom and separate toilet off the main living area.
- Light infused living room with front garden views through large sash bar windows, polished timber floors and cosy OFP and open kitchen/meals with breakfast bar, stainless steel gas cook top/oven and new rangehood.
- Private deck overlooking rear garden/lawn area provides the ideal setting to relax or watch over children playing.
- Further features include a laundry/powder room with separate toilet, GDH, gas hot water, ample linen/storage space, garden shed and single carport with additional off street parking for another two cars/caravan.
- Easy walk to Exeter Road shopping/cafe precinct, recreation reserves and bus links. Short drive to Eastland/Croydon/Chirnside Park shopping precincts, train stations, quality schools including Oxley and Luther Colleges, the picturesque Yarra Valley or CBD via Eastlink.

Address: 17 Anningie Park Place Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
Pure prestige with panoramic views
In a commanding position at the top of a court, the Mount Gambier limestone façade of this luxurious 5 bedroom residence is complemented by panoramic views of the Dandenong and Warburton Ranges.
Fitted with premium imported and local products throughout, relax in the expansive lounge, soundproofed theatre room and media retreat with balcony. The massive kitchen with quartz surfaces, alongside the living and dining room, all revel in the impressive view of the sandstone alfresco and solar-heated infinity pool/spa. Delight in the main bedroom with huge balcony, retreat, walk-in robe and spa ensuite.
A premium school precinct near Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, live close to Chirnside Park and Eastland shopping centres.
* Custom-designed luxury five bedroom, four bathroom home
* Views of the Dandenong and Warburton Ranges
* Infinity pool, sandstone alfresco and landscaped gardens
* An array of exquisite living zones
* Main bedroom with balcony, retreat, WIR and ensuite
* Ducted air-conditioning, heating and vacuum plus fans throughout
* Near prestigious schools and excellent shopping centres
* Circular driveway with off-street parking for up to five cars
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.17anningieparkplacecroydonnorth.com
Terms 10% deposit, balance 90/120 days

Description:
Build Your Dream Home!
This is a rare opportunity to secure an exceptional lifestyle, with this large allotment of approximately 2146sqm. Experience a sense of rural tranquillity amongst native vegetation, whilst enjoying an elevated vantage point, offering far-reaching views over Wonga Park and the Yarra Valley.
The location itself has a family friendly appeal, being close to a number of parklands and walking trails, such as Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve, whilst being within close proximity to a variety of desired amenities including Croydon train station, Croydon Leisure & Aquatic Centre, Swinburne TAFE and a number of elite schools such as Croydon Hills Primary School and Yarra Valley Grammar. Plentiful shopping options can be found at Croydon North and Chirnside Park Shopping Centres, along with Croydon's bustling township offering boutique shops, cafes and eateries.
Call today for the chance to build your dream home in this serene and scenic location, positioned on over half an acre of land.
Thinking of selling? Call us today; Boronia office on 9761 2277, Wantirna office on 9800 1225 or Rowville office on 9755 6666
TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST click on either of the following tabs and fill in your details, BOOK AN INSPECTION on the Biggin & Scott website or EMAIL AGENT / CONTACT AGENT on Real Estate.com.au and other websites. You will be contacted by one of our agents and will also receive a text advising of inspection times.

Address: 10 Silver Birch Close Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
Family Entertainer with Magnificent Surrounds
A fantastic option for a growing or established family, this high quality home is located in an exclusive cul-de-sac within the Tiffany Park Estate. Sited on a beautifully manicured allotment of 774sqm (approx.), it features a spacious, well-maintained interior and exciting outdoor spaces.
Adorned with slate and new carpet and bamboo floors, the entry level offers a choice of formal and informal living areas all serviced by a central timber kitchen. The family room and casual meals area boast access to the outdoors where you'll discover a sizeable deck (with shade sail), yard and cubby house.
There are four robed bedrooms in total plus a versatile fifth bedroom/study option also equipped with a BIR. Finished with a walk-in robe, spa ensuite and balcony access, the master is particularly impressive.
Completing the package is the home's position, within close proximity of parks, buses and top schools including Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College.
Additional Features:
*Double garage, water tank, wood store
*GDH, wood fire, evap cooling, A/C unit
*Roof recapped, repainted & repointed
*High boundary fences for privacy (new)
*Downstairs powder room & laundry
*Proximity to Hochkins Ridge Reserve
*Near Croydon Hills Primary School

Description:
A home to capture your heart
Presented to perfection with wonderful weatherboard appeal, this beautiful home is set amid gorgeous gardens with standard roses, lush lawn and idyllic picket fence. The warm interior delivers high ceilings, ornate plasterwork and other period features, with the hub of the home designed to incorporate a dining area, lounge and light-filled kitchen with gas cooking and deck access. There are also 3 comfortable bedrooms, a spacious family bathroom and sundrenched alfresco deck just perfect for weekend relaxation and entertaining. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling and will take care of all seasons, and you are within easy reach of a choice of schools, shops, Warrien Reserve and the beautiful Yarra Valley. Start packing now - you'll want to move in straight away!
- Beautiful weatherboard home amid gorgeous gardens
- Timber floors, high ceilings, wonderful period charm
- Open living/dining/kitchen, sunbathed entertainer's deck
- Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, under-house storage and more

Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Show - Stopping Modern Architecture
Only 5 years old and sparkling in ultra-modern splendour, this immaculate tri-level home offers magnificent elevated views in a prized neighbourhood of similarly stylish homes. Feature-packed to ensure a truly luxurious lifestyle, the stunning interior is matched by fully landscaped gardens and inviting alfresco spaces.
- Architect designed tri-level home set on a fully landscaped 895m2 (approx.) allotment
- Swathes of natural light and elevated views set the mood in this unique residence
- The spacious interior features chic plush carpet and modern styling throughout
- A choice of living zones include open plan meals/living zone, flexible dining room (or media room), and huge top level rumpus/retreat
- The well-appointed kitchen boasts stone benchtops, Ilve stainless steel appliances, big island bench and butlers pantry
- All 4 bedrooms have generous walk-in robes, including the master suite which also enjoys a designer ensuite
- A generous open study, zoned family bathroom, powder room and practical laundry complete the interior
- Several alfresco areas ensure plenty of options when it comes to outdoor dining and relaxation, and the beautifully landscaped garden is a haven to be explored
- Additional features include triple zoned ducted heating/cooling, ducted vacuum, 5.8kW solar electricity, video intercom, alarm and integrated triple garage.
A short drive to the private school precinct, train station, Eastland Shopping Centre and Eastlink, at the doorstep of the delightful Yarra Valley, this is the stylish contemporary lifestyle you have been aspiring to. Act now.

Description:
When Space & Privacy Matter
Space, quality and privacy are the hallmarks of this contemporary 2-storey residence. In a whisper quiet position at the rear of an immaculate block, this 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home abuts reserve and is perfect if you're a busy family, investor or professional. An internal access remote double garage introduces a beautiful, light-filled interior featuring multiple living areas, high ceilings, ducted heating, modern decor and evaporative cooling. Upstairs are 3 double bedrooms (with scenic views and robes) and a lovely family bathroom; the master has fitted WIR and ensuite. A ground floor study and powder room/third toilet are handy too. Cook up a storm in the large, open plan gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s appliances, excellent storage and island. An elegant formal lounge, a generous dining area and big family room, opening to the roofed entertaining area and private, easy-care landscaped garden; gives you space for any occasion. Plus: excellent storage and 2 security doors. A prized no-through road; a few short steps to transport, Exeter village, Village School Primary and reserves. Near Chirnside shopping, EastLink and Oxley College.
Angelique Rita : 0421 319 516

Description:
Expressions of Interest by Tuesday 28 February at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
A Wonderland for Family Living
This well-loved family home in excellently maintained condition has served its one owner family for many years and been extended and renovated over time. Ready to be embraced by a new family to modernise and enjoy and make it their own. Set on the high side of a quiet no-through road with panoramic mountain views.
Look out to Mount Dandenong from the light open kitchen/meals area. The 2 spacious living rooms can be extended for alfresco entertaining by the large rear alfresco terrace under shade sail. Featuring a family friendly back garden and extensive off-street parking space at the front. This peaceful green locale is protected by the Birt's Hill Limited Development Overlay. Modernise or make your own improvements (STCA) without fear of over capitalization. Million dollar plus homes are now being developed in this sought after setting.
* Ducted heating and split system air-conditioners
* Garden shed/workshop
* Main bedroom with ensuite
* Family bathroom and separate shower room
* Parklands and reserves close by
* Croydon Hills Primary School
* Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar
* Local shops nearby. Croydon Station and shops minutes away
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.43alicestreetcroydonnorth.com
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 120 days negotiable

Description:
Your Every Day Indulgence
Exquisitely stylish yet entirely approachable and exuding natural light soaked warmth and enviable tranquility, this beautifully secluded, 3 years young, single level American inspired home is a sight to behold. Privately tucked away down an extended driveway on a sizeable fully landscaped allotment of 864m2 that welcomes indigenous birdlife and glorious rear north facing sunshine. The formal space is cleverly zoned with French slider doors opening to a versatile open plan Living, Dining and Family domain laid with character filled Sydney blue gum hardwood floors. A high-end Caesarstone Kitchen is meticulously designed with elite Euro appliances including 1.5 ovens, gas cooker and dishwasher. Additionally appointed with exceptional soft close custom-made cabinetry and a feature double door pantry.
Entertaining is truly a pleasure with the Living zone fusing with an indoor/outdoor covered alfresco flowing through to a natural outdoor environment with the ambience of tree top living. Open for summer with optional shade cloths and intimate and secure for winter with commercial grade cafe blinds. Lush lawns and native hardy gardens wrap around this idyllic home, with an underhouse cellar/storage/workshop.
Comprising 3 generous Bedrooms, large BIRs and 2 chic bathrooms (main with sep WC). The Master is perfectly secluded and zoned away from the children's wing with fitted WIR and deluxe ensuite with dual vanity and double shower.
Close to esteemed schools including Yarra Road Primary, Good Shepherd Primary, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Minutes to Croydon Train Station, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, wineries and sports facilities. Good access to buses and freeway.
6 star energy rated, all the windows and external glass doors are double glazed for your absolute comfort. Comfort is further enhanced by GDH, split system in main living area, pure wool carpets, security alarm, surveillance cameras, laundry with excellent storage, integrated study cupboard with connections, skylights in living zone, 4,350L watertanks combined (one linked to WCS), utilities shed, electronic entrance gates with video intercom entry, DLUG with storage racks and internal entry plus large carparking for boat/caravan space and OSP.
If you've been waiting for something truly exceptionally unique - this hidden gem will not disappoint!

Description:
THE ULTIMATE DISCOVERY FOR YOUNG FAMILIES, DOWNSIZERS AND INVESTORS
Live the life of quality and class in this flawless double storey townhouse, positioned a short walk from the bus stop and a quick commute to Croydon Main Street shops, Chirnside Park shopping centre and to the local Croydon North strip shops. Approx 8 years young the property is the ultimate discovery for a young family who want the nice house and enough yard to enjoy without the upkeep, and for downsizers who enjoy their creature comforts, an ideal location and a home that is appointed with modern features that make for an easy lifestyle.
Kept comfortable throughout the seasons with ducted heating and split system cooling, the 2 bedroom plus study or 3 bedroom floorplan is enhanced with high 2.6m ceilings, easy care flooring and a hostess kitchen and meals zone that leads out to your choice of a sunny or covered sitting areas and a private back yard. The living room is a social space; there are two bedrooms on the first floor along with the ensuite style bathroom and study nook. Added details includes a single garage, external window shutters, ducted vacuum, LED lights and ample under stair storage.

Description:
Smart Start or Investment
Located on an easy-care, corner block of 466m2 approx, this very comfortable home would make an ideal start in a popular family neighbourhood, close to transport, Croydon North Plaza and the Village Primary School. Set behind a high fence for complete privacy with ample off street parking, discover a light filled spacious interior that's ready to go with contemporary furnishings. Gas ducted heating and split system cooling ensure year round comfort. Cooking will be a breeze in the kitchen/meals with dishwasher and the large lounge and dining is the ideal place to relax. Three bedrooms share a family bathroom and separate toilet. With potential to add your own touches too, other highlights include: front decking, large lawn area and more.
Naiomi Bentley : 0404 036 044

Description:
GLAMOUROUS, STYLISH AND BRAND NEW
Richly rewarding for astute home buyers and savvy investors, this brand new three bedroom, two bathroom, architect-designed town residence has been constructed by luxury home builder, Platinum Properties.
An idyllic and leafy street is the perfect setting where you can gently stroll to Hughes Park and Croydon North shopping precinct. Situated just moments away for your absolute convenience are private schools, Yarra Road Primary School, and the vibrant entertainment, eateries and fashion at Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, minutes drive to Eastland and Eastlink.
Delivering you the ultimate lifestyle with striking contemporary facade and first-class accommodation, the open-plan living, dining and sparkling Smartstone kitchen with stainless steel appliances are enhanced by gloriously sunny landscaped garden.
Finely appointed with ducted heating, cooling, high ceilings, LED lighting, lavish bathrooms, luxe tapware, and double auto garage with internal access.

Description:
A Cut Above The Rest
Quietly positioned at the very end of the block is this enticingly spacious residence that combines quality fixtures and fittings with private, leafy surrounds. Sun-drenched interiors are enhanced by the warmth of natural timber floors and high ceilings that flow throughout the open plan living zone. Large windows frame leafy views in the living room which extends through to the dining area that is bordered by sliding stacker doors that retract to reveal an entertainer's haven. An expansive deck boasts tranquil alfresco living and access to the neatly landscaped gardens complete with water tank and cubby house. A perfectly conceived kitchen features granite benchtops and quality Blanco stainless steel appliances. Discover three well-proportioned bedrooms including the Master with wall-to-wall robes and access to the bathroom with granite vanity. Further highlights include ducted heating, split-system cooling, powder room and double auto garage with internal access. This single-level, low-maintenance home is superbly positioned within walking distance to Maroondah Village, the bus stop and schools. Near to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Eastland and EastLink.
Lee Fenech : 0410 426 400

Description:
Beautifully Presented & Ready to Go
First homebuyers, investors and retirees, are you searching for a beautifully presented home on a low-maintenance corner block? This single-level 3 bedroom home promises you easy living, just a few short steps to a bus stop, Exeter village, Village School Primary and reserves. Hidden back behind a tranquil garden, the appeal starts with a stylishly rendered facade, excellent off street parking and a large roofed porch. Indoors delivers you light, comfort and style incorporating high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, tasteful decor, security doors and downlights. The practical design places 3 double bedrooms (BIRs) and an updated family bathroom in the rear wing. A laundry with storage, second toilet and large linen press also have their own wing. The formal lounge room is a relaxing haven, while the modern kitchen/meals area is well equipped with Euromaid oven, breakfast bar and abundant cupboard space. A spacious roofed entertaining area, barbeque area and easy-care garden ensures carefree outdoor living too. Plus: under-house storage and backyard gates for a trailer. Near Oxley College, Child Care and Chirnside Shopping.
Lee Fenech : 0410 426 400

Address: 12/7 Bonnie View Road Croydon North VIC 3136
Description:
True Low Maintenance Living in Quality Location
Set at the rear of a lovely quiet development this charming 2 bedroom home offers low maintenance living in peaceful surrounds.
You will be impressed by the lovely open plan living room and spacious dining area. Adjacent is the sizeable kitchen with ample storage, stylish oven and hotplates. Both bedrooms are generous in size and boast built in robes and large windows so they are light and bright. The central bathroom will impress with shower, separate bath and vanity with storage.
Rising above the rear yard is the large timber deck. Ideal for entertaining friends and family alike or just relaxing at the end of a long day, you will find it is the perfect place to spend your time on warm summer evenings.
Location is excellent so close to Warrien Reserve and all that Croydon North has to offer including schools such as Melba Secondary College-Junior Campus and Croydon primary School.
Other features include tinted windows throughout, air conditioning, gas ducted heating, single garage with remote door and rear access, and to help make your weekends your own, the front garden is maintained by the body corporate.
